sn3.17:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe samādhiggayha tiṭṭhati – diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ samparāyikañcā"ti?
sn3.17:2: "Atthi kho, mahārāja, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe samādhiggayha tiṭṭhati – diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ samparāyikañcā"ti.
sn3.17:3: "Katamo pana, bhante, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samādhiggayha tiṭṭhati – diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ samparāyikañcā"ti?
sn3.17:4: "Appamādo kho, mahārāja, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samādhiggayha tiṭṭhati – diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ samparāyikañcāti. Seyyathāpi, mahārāja, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṁ pāṇānaṁ padajātāni, sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṁ gacchanti, hatthipadaṁ tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati – yadidaṁ mahantattena; evameva kho, mahārāja, appamādo eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samādhiggayha tiṭṭhati – diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ samparāyikañcā"ti. Idamavoca … pe …
sn3.17:6: Appamādaṁ pasaṁsanti,puññakiriyāsu paṇḍitā;Appamatto ubho atthe,adhiggaṇhāti paṇḍito.
sn3.17:7: Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho,yo cattho samparāyiko;Atthābhisamayā dhīro,paṇḍitoti pavuccatī"ti.
